type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.maven.tasks.GenerateMavenPom
type.description:
Generates a Maven module descriptor (POM) file.
(since 1.4)

method.name: getDestination
method.description:
The file the POM will be written to.

returns:The file the POM will be written to

method.name: getPom
method.description:
The Maven POM.

returns:The Maven POM.

method.name: setDestination
method.description:
Sets the destination the descriptor will be written to. The value is resolved with org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)
param:destination The file the descriptor will be written to.

property.name: destination
property.description:
The file the POM will be written to.

returns:The file the POM will be written to

property.name: pom
property.description:
The Maven POM.

returns:The Maven POM.
